title: Tear of goddess bug
body: I cannot buy the second tear of goddess for ezreal for unknown reason. Please check if there is any bug on it pls.

replies.body:
There was a change to how Tear and Tear upgrade items work with the patch 9.6 notes, as follows:
> If you own Manamune(/Muramana) or Archangel's Staff(/Seraph's Embrace), you're unable to purchase the other (or another Tear of the Goddess)
> 
> Link for reference: https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-96-notes#patch-items

Basically, it's no longer possible to buy multiple tears/tear-items.
